channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Thanksgiving And Gratitude For An Emerging Generation Of World Leaders
item.description: Research suggests that the current generation of young adults aren't waiting long to become world leaders, and there's reasons to be thankful for the ...

item.title: Canada cozies up to India for trade deal after years of strain as Trump continues pushing the world into new alliances
item.description: Canada is also seeking better relations with Beijing, holding a meeting at the Asia-Pacific summit last month.

item.title: The AI Race Is Becoming A Sprint For Power
item.description: America’s AI race now hinges on electricity, not algorithms. Why powering data centers and modernizing the grid will define U.S. competitiveness in th...

item.title: ‘It wasn’t worth the $10 tariff for a $27 purchase’: American shoppers find maybe they just won’t buy that small thing from Canada or England this year
item.description: Getting rid of the so-called de minimis exemption was meant to curb drug trafficking and stop low-quality goods flooding the U.S. market.

item.title: ICE agents using AI ‘may explain the inaccuracy of these reports,’ judge writes, noting a body cam video shows an agent asking ChatGPT for help
item.description: The judge noted factual discrepancies between the official narrative about those law enforcement responses and what body camera footage showed.

item.title: Tariffs have surprising effect on unemployment and inflation patterns, Fed analysis reveals
item.description: The San Francisco Federal Reserve warns that current tariffs are "unprecedented in magnitude" compared to 40 years of trade data, making economic pred...

item.title: Apple AirPods 4 Now At Lowest Price Ever In Show-Stealing Special Offers
item.description: The latest Black Friday deals are live now and AirPods 4 are a standout. Here are the full details.

item.title: Apple yanked a brand-new TV show just days before it was scheduled to air amid allegations of plagiarism
item.description: Reports say Apple was unaware of the similarities between its show "The Hunt" and Douglas Fairbairn's novel, "Shoot," throughout development.

item.title: The Only ‘Stranger Things’ Seasons 1-4 Recap You Need To Watch Before Season 5
item.description: Here is a video (well, a few) recap of Stranger Things seasons 1-4 that you can watch to catch up before season 5 tonight.

item.title: At Target, we believe retail’s next great disruptor is emotion. Look no further than this year’s winter wonderland

item.title: Do Not Download These Windows Security Updates, Experts Warn
item.description: Not all Windows security updates are created equal, and experts warn that these ones will hack rather than protect your computer.

item.title: Consumer confidence falls sharply as Americans worry about the economy
item.description: Consumer confidence plunged in November to lowest level since April as Americans cite inflation, tariffs, and uncertainty as weighing on sentiment, ac...

item.title: 5 on board American Airlines flight hospitalized after odor diverts plane
item.description: American Airlines Flight 2118 was diverted to Houston, Texas, after the crew "reported fumes in the flight deck and cabin," according to the FAA.

item.title: Builders cut prices and offer new home incentives as affordability gap shrinks

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
